headline: Teamsters Seek Injunction to Block UPS Driver Separation Plan
summary: The union alleges a planned voluntary buyout plan violates the parties' 2023 labor contract as the carrier cuts Amazon volumes and reshapes its network.

raw.headline: Teamsters Seek Injunction to Block UPS Driver Separation Plan
raw.summary: The union alleges a planned voluntary buyout plan violates the parties' 2023 labor contract as the carrier cuts Amazon volumes and reshapes its network.

headline: UPS' plan to cut 30,000 jobs hits legal roadblock amid Amazon pivot
summary: Last month during its Q4 2025 earnings call, the delivery giant United Parcel Service (UPS) announced 30,000 job reductions as part of its strategy to cut Amazon volume. Now, in less than a month, UPS is facing legal escalation from one of the largest unions across the US, demanding a halt to the ...

headline: How packaging and logistics companies are automating their warehouses
summary: Companies like UPS, FedEx and DHL are increasingly turning to automation in their warehouse processes to work toward greater efficiency and lower costs.

raw.headline: How packaging and logistics companies are automating their warehouses
